text: Gunnar Garbo (19 April 1924 - 29 June 2016) was a Norwegian journalist, politician and ambassador. He represented the Liberal Party of Norway at the Norwegian Parliament during four electoral periods. He served from 1958 to 1973. He was leader for the party from 1964 to 1970. He was ambassador in Dar es Salaam from 1987 to 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gunnar Garbo biography Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Norway Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Gunnar Garbo
